name: Lady Bug Arcade
summary:
It's dinnertime and Lady Bug is hungry! Guide her around the garden collecting flowers and hearts while avoiding the deadly insects trying to make *her* their dinner!

Luckily, the garden is equipped with many revolving doors that the lady bug can use to block the enemy's attack or steer them into the deadly poison.

Scattered throughout the scene are letters that can be used to spell EXTRA for a bonus lady bug or SPECIAL for a visit to the VEGGIE BOUNTY and a chance to feast in the all-you -can-eat harvest!

GOOD LUCK!
